quote: Forgiveness is healing—everything is energy—thoughts create—we are all connected—what you resist persists—true love never dies—the soul’s immortality is the only true immortality—
quote_letters: FORGIVENESS IS HEALING-EVERYTHING IS ENERGY-THOUGHTS CREATE-WE ARE ALL CONNECTED-WHAT YOU RESIST PERSISTS-TRUE LOVE NEVER DIES-THE SOULS IMMORTALITY IS THE ONLY TRUE IMMORTALITY-
